## Our Proven 5-Step Process

::: {.process-steps}
::: {.process-step}
#### Initial Consultation & Project Analysis

**Duration:** 1-2 days

**What We Do:**

- Review project documentation
- Understand your requirements and constraints
- Assess project complexity and risks
- Define scope and deliverables

**Your Investment:** Free consultation (30-60 min)
:::

::: {.process-step}
#### Link BIM Entities with Cost Base

**Duration:** 1-2 days

**What We Do:**

- Ingest IFC and Revit files from various platforms
- Validate model accuracy and completeness
- Set up 5D BIM environment
- Link BIM entities with cost databases

**Deliverable:** Validated 5D BIM model
:::

::: {.process-step}
#### Automated Quantity Take-off

**Duration:** 1-2 days

**What We Do:**

- Extract quantities automatically from BIM model
- Cross-check with 2D drawings
- Identify any discrepancies or missing elements
- Generate detailed Bill of Quantities (BOQ)

**Deliverable:** Comprehensive BOQ with measurements
:::

::: {.process-step}
#### Cost Estimation & Analysis

**Duration:** 2-3 days

**What We Do:**

- Apply current market rates
- Factor in project-specific risks
- Run multi-scenario cost analysis
- Provide value engineering recommendations

**Deliverable:** Detailed cost estimate with breakdown
:::

::: {.process-step}
#### Budget Planning & Reporting

**Duration:** 1 day

**What We Do:**

- Develop cashflow projections
- Create budget allocation by phase
- Prepare comprehensive cost report
- Present findings and recommendations

**Deliverable:** Executive summary + detailed report
:::
:::

::: {style="text-align: center; margin: 32px 0; padding: 24px; background: var(--bim-light-gray); border-radius: 8px;"}
**Total Timeline:** 6-10 working days  
**Total Project Duration:** Typically 2-3 weeks from start to finish
:::

## Frequently Asked Questions

::: {.faq-section}
::: {.faq-item}
::: {.faq-question}
**Q: What information do you need to provide an estimate?**
:::
::: {.faq-answer}
A: Ideally, a BIM model (IFC or Revit file). If unavailable, we work with 2D drawings + specifications (timelines may extend 2-3 days).
:::
:::

::: {.faq-item}
::: {.faq-question}
**Q: How accurate are your estimates?**
:::
::: {.faq-answer}
A: Our 5D BIM estimates achieve ±5% accuracy (when model is accurate and complete) vs ±15-20% traditional methods. Backed by 20 years experience and 2000+ projects.
:::
:::

::: {.faq-item}
::: {.faq-question}
**Q: Do you work with projects already in construction?**
:::
::: {.faq-answer}
A: Yes! We provide ongoing cost control including weekly reports, change order analysis, and budget tracking.
:::
:::

::: {.faq-item}
::: {.faq-question}
**Q: Can you integrate with our existing software?**
:::
::: {.faq-answer}
A: Yes, we export to Excel, MS Project, Primavera P6, and most cost management platforms.
:::
:::

::: {.faq-item}
::: {.faq-question}
**Q: What project sizes do you handle?**
:::
::: {.faq-answer}
A: It depends on the industry. For warehouses and logistics centers, we handle projects from 5,000 sqm to 100,000+ sqm. For residential and commercial projects, our expertise ranges from small developments to large-scale mixed-use complexes. Each project type has different complexity factors beyond just size.
:::
:::

::: {.faq-item}
::: {.faq-question}
**Q: How do your fees compare?**
:::
::: {.faq-answer}
A: We provide bespoke quotes tailored to each project's specific requirements, complexity, and scope. Contact us for a customized proposal that meets your needs.
:::
:::

::: {.faq-item}
::: {.faq-question}
**Q: Do you provide estimates for tendering?**
:::
::: {.faq-answer}
A: Absolutely. We offer full tendering support including: quantity take-off, detailed cost estimation, bid document preparation, contractor negotiations, and handover support. Our comprehensive service covers the entire tendering lifecycle.
:::
:::
:::
